entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
